column1: lacho is a Sindarin word meaning "flame".
The word is commonly understood as a verbal imperative.Didier Willis
column2: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 19 July 2011)

column1: Lacho calad! Drego morn! Flame Light! Flee Night!
